content: Anyone having "service not available" problems with the internal email section of Military.Com the last two days? Just the email section in my case is not in service, basic Military.Com fine. Work email is ******* Sorry, but personal contact information is not authorized. They will post their replies here. Stick around here and get to know us and let us get to know you. We wish you the best of everything. This message has been edited. Last edited by: OldArmyLove, Wed 27 May 2009 07:43 AM
